segments.text: I can't believe my eyes—that stool is tipping over!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is hanging on for dear life, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's arm is up, totally caught off guard by the wobble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is cascading down like a waterfall indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't turned around yet; she's still drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle—how is she not slipping?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a serene garden, such a shock against this frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies are probably tumbling out as he reaches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen was so ordinary a second ago, now it's pure mayhem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the faucet to be running full blast like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets make the whole thing look even more precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a unexpected twist in this domestic drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm stunned at how no one's reacting to any of it.
segments.speaker: PAR
